description: Find the first digit of a given number.
input_format: A single line containing the number as a string.
output_format: A single line containing the first digit as a string.
prompt:
; Find the first digit of a given number.
; Input format: A single line containing the number as a string.
; Output format: A single line containing the first digit as a string.

#lang racket
completions:
(define (first-digit n)
  (define (digit n)
    (if (zero? n)
        0
        (remainder n 10)))
  (digit (string->number (string (string->number n)))))

(first-digit "12345") ; Output: "1"
(first-digit "987654321") ; Output: "9"
(first-digit "0") ; Output: "0"
